desc: H3F3AP4 is a pseudogene of H3F3A. The functions of H3F3AP4 are unknown.

Chromatin is the physiological template of human genetic information and is built out of nucleosomes, which are octamers assembled from histones proteins H2A, H2B, H3 and H4 (PMID: 11498575). Nothing is known about the functions of H3F3AP4.

articles.title: Translating the histone code.
articles.reference: Jenuwein T et al. Science (New York, N.Y.). 2001 Aug 10;293(5532)1074-80.
